results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1; a(n) = A000079(A193231(A007814(n))) * A250469(a(A268674(n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1914
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: A000035(a(n)) = A000035(n). [This permutation preserves the parity of n.]
A020639(a(n)) = A020639(n). [More generally, it preserves the smallest prime dividing n.]
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 11 2016
